Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.virtual.cli

Class CliBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.virtual.cli.CliBoard
  • abstract class CliBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible of depicting the Board on the CLI interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  CliBoard.WallType
      The possible types of walls separating two Cells.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        static void build​(Board board)
        Adds the board's area to the CliCommon's grid.
        Parameters:
        board - the Board to depict.

      • writeCell

        Writes a single Cell on the grid.
        Parameters:

      • getWall

        private static CliBoard.WallType getWall​(Cell cell,
                                         Cell neighbour)
        Returns the type of wall separating a Cell from its neighbour.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell.
        neighbour - its neighbouring cell.
        Returns:
        the appropriate CliBoard.WallType.

      • buildWallCounterclockwise

        private static void buildWallCounterclockwise​(int cellX,
                                              int cellY,
                                              int cornerId,
                                              CliBoard.WallType type,
                                              java.lang.String color)
        Builds the border of a Cell, minding the surroundings.
        Parameters:
        cellX - the Cell's horizontal position.
        cellY - the Cell's vertical position.
        cornerId - a number (1~4) identifying one of the corners. They are numbered in ascending order starting at the bottom-left corner and proceeding counter-clockwise.
        type - the wall found next to the specified corner.
        color - the ANSI escape for the Cell's colour.
